===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=くつちかき|鼾|tr1=kutsuchi|t1=snoring; epilepsy|掻き|tr2=kaki|t2=making something manifest}}, the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|掻く|tr=kaku||to scratch; to make manifest}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|くつちかき}}
